description:
Meet the Rock. He's a straight Marine type of guy, but does have a relaxed attitude about sex with dudes.
I'm obviously a big fan of the "straight guy" gets serviced theme. I don't know why I find it so hot to watch the dude watch his movie and then see them lose it.
I know, there's Bryan on his knees again, but these vids are obviously fun to shoot, and as I said, I' m a big fan of the theme. I hope my editing skills (and cock sucking skills) do it justice.
Enjoy!
title: Bryan & Rockland - Serviced
